content.query:
DROP TABLE [dbo].[People]
GO
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[People]
( 
	[id] VARCHAR(20),
	[FIRST NAME] varchar(20) ,
	[LAST NAME] varchar(20) ,
	[Gender] varchar(20),
	[Country] varchar(20) ,
	[AGE] varchar(20) ,
	[DATE] [date]  
)
WITH
(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
GO


COPY INTO dbo.People
(id 1,[First Name] 2,[Last Name] 3,Gender 4,Country 5,Age 6,Date 7)
FROM 'https://harshadatalakestorage2.dfs.core.windows.net/demoharsha/Sample.csv'
 
 WITH
(        
FILE_TYPE = 'CSV',
MAXERRORS=0,
IDENTITY_INSERT='OFF'
)
